Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣たちとゲオルギアスの戦い、か…… なんだか不思議ね。
Entry.EnglishText: The fight between the Sacred Beasts and Geyorkias, huh... Don't you find it somewhat strange?

Entry.JapaneseText: そんな大きな戦いがあったなら、何かそれらしき 伝説のひとつも残っていてもよさそうなのに……
Entry.EnglishText: Even though such a great battle occurred, there were no legends left behind that resemble that event...

Entry.JapaneseText: 聖獣王の名前、メセチナ洞窟の石碑、<Blue>闇の力<White>、 <Yellow>「聖なる鳥」<White>、充分だと思うが？
Entry.EnglishText: The name of the King of the Sacred Beasts, the Stele in the Mesechina Caverns, the Power of Shade, the Sacred Bird... Are those not enough?
Entry.Notes: Probably going on the reprogramming block

Entry.JapaneseText: もう何千年も昔の伝説だ。 風化してしまうのは無理もない。
Entry.EnglishText: Those legends have been passed down for thousands of years. It's no wonder the details were lost to time.

Entry.JapaneseText: 私たちはこの国の事について、 知らなすぎるんだわ……
Entry.EnglishText: We know very little about what has happened in our country...
